text: The 22671/22672 Chennai Egmore - Madurai Junction Tejas Express is India's second semi-high speed Tejas Express introduced by Indian Railways connecting and in Tamilnadu, after Mumbai CSMT - Karmali Tejas Express. It is currently being operated with 22671/22672 train numbers on six days a week basis. ==Coach Composition == The 22671/22672 Chennai Egmore - Madurai Junction Tejas Express presently has 1 AC Executive Chair Car, 12 AC Chair Car coaches along with 2 End-on Generator coaches. As with most train services in India, Coach Composition may be amended at the discretion of Indian Railways depending on demand. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders unsortable" style="text- align:center" |- !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:Brown;"| Loco !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:lightgreen;"| 1 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:pink;"| 2 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 3 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 4 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 5 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 6 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 7 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 8 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 9 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 10 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 11 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 12 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 13 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:yellow;"| 14 !scope="col" rowspan="1" style="background:lightgreen;"| 15 |- | ||EOG||EC1||C12||C11||C10||C9||C8||C7||C6||C5||C4||C3||C2||C1||EOG |} == Service== The 22671/22672 Chennai Egmore - Madurai Junction Tejas Express currently operates 6 days a week, covering 493 km in 6 hrs 30mins (76 km/hr average speed). == Route & Halts == The important halts of the train are : * '''''' * * * '''''' ==Traction== Both trains are hauled by a Royapuram based WAP 7 locomotive on its entire journey. == See also == *Vande Bharat Express *Humsafar Express *Antyodya Express *Tejas Express *Uday Express == Notes == == References == Category:Tejas Express trains Category:Rail transport in Tamil Nadu Category:Transport in Chennai Category:Transport in Madurai Category:Railway services introduced in 2019
title: Chennai Egmore–Madurai Tejas Express
